author: nd
msg: add more test cases for mod_include.
compact all include tests in one file
open extra port with name based VHs for mod_include, which allows to test
different SSI(Start|End)Tags by just supplying another host header.

author: nd
msg: allow the creation of name based virtual hosts from .conf.in files.
If you supply <VirtualHost servername:module> sections it will open
just one port and insert proper NameVirtualHost and ServerName directives

author: jwoolley
msg: Make mod_ssl consistent with itself when you have a halfass install of
openssl-engine (ie, you're missing the headers).  ssl_cmd_SSLCryptoDevice()
is thrown away by the preprocessor if you're missing the header, so the
call to it should have the same condition applied.  otherwise, mod_ssl
